sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_80351d904f2ff600dbec7bb28110c765
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Affected CIs Transform Map">9c73dd904f2ff600dbec7bb28110c7ee</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	incident = new GlideRecordSecure("incident"); 
	incident.initialize();
	incident.addQuery(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_field_name'), source.problem);
	incident.query();
	if(incident.next()) {

	}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Problem to Incident Transformation Map">a4867ed14ffbd600dbec7bb28110c7d3</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	if(source.problem_state == "OPEN") {
		return "";
	}
	else {
		// do not update the existing problem state if user disabled autoresolve incidents
		if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.autoresolveproblems') == 'true') {
			return "Dynatrace detected recovery";
		}
		else {
			return "";
		}
	}
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_dynat_ruxit_problems</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wolfgang</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-17 08:47:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad45dec8db9d6b40190bd92b5e96196c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_ad45dec8db9d6b40190bd92b5e96196c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wolfgang</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-17 10:57:32</sys_updated_on><target_field>close_notes</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_6a609f52db52cf40190bd92b5e96191c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Dynatrace CMDB Sync</name><run_as/><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:10:00</run_period><run_start>2017-11-10 13:32:02</run_start><run_time>1969-12-31 23:01:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// jshint maxerr:300
var hostTypes = {
	'LINUX' : 'cmdb_ci_linux_server', 
	'WINDOWS' : 'cmdb_ci_win_server', 
	'AIX' : 'cmdb_ci_aix_server'
};

var itemIndex = {};
var pl = {};
pl['items'] = [];
pl['relations'] = [];

var sysIds = {};

function extractTags(tj) {
	var sb = [];
	for(i = 0; i < tj.length; i++) {
		t = "";
		if(tj[i]['context'].toLowerCase() !== 'contextless'){
			t = '[' + tj[i]['context'] + ']';
		}
		t += tj[i]['key'];
		if(tj[i]['value']) {
			t += ':' + tj[i]['value'];
		}
		sb.push(t);
	}
	sb[sb.length-1] = sb[sb.length-1] + ','; 
	return sb.join();
	//gs.error(sb.join());
	//gs.error(JSON.stringify(tj));
}

function extractDependentHostInformation(obj,hostEntityId,parentId,source){

		for (var k=0;k<obj.length;k++) {
			
			try {
				
				
				var child_key = obj[k]['entityId'];

				if (child_key === hostEntityId)
				{
					
					//gs.debug ("Parent Host:" + parentId + "- Child Host :" + child_key + "- HostEntityId :" + hostEntityId);
					var item = {};
					var values = {};

					var isMonitoringCandidate = obj[k]['isMonitoringCandidate'];
					if (typeof isMonitoringCandidate  == 'undefined' || isMonitoringCandidate === false)
					{
						item['className'] = hostTypes[obj[k]['osType']];

						
						if (gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.use_customized_names') == 'true') {
							values['name'] = dyn.shortHostName(obj[k]['displayName']);
						}
						else {
							values['name'] = dyn.shortHostName(obj[k]['discoveredName']);
						}
						values[gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_field_name')] = obj[k]['entityId'];	
						item['values'] = values;

						//Add new item to payload and store its payload index
						pl['items'].push(item);
						// Remember the itemIndex for the child Hosts
						itemIndex[child_key] = pl['items'].length - 1; 
						if(source == "fromRel") {
							addRelationship(parentId,child_key,'Depends on::Used by');
						}
						
						if(source == "toRel") {
							addRelationship(child_key,parentId,'Depends on::Used by');
						}

					}
				}
			}
			catch(err) {
				gs.error("Dynatrace exception establishing Host Relationships for Host: " + obj[k]['entityId'] + "Error : " + err);
			}
		}
}

function addRelationship(parentDTid, childDTid, type) {
	//gs.debug(JSON.stringify({"parent": itemIndex[parentDTid], "child": itemIndex[childDTid], "type": type}));
	pl['relations'].push({"parent": itemIndex[parentDTid], "child": itemIndex[childDTid], "type": type});
}

function pullApplicationProcessesForServer(hostJson, hostId, mid, token) {
	var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	if(mid) {
		restMessage.setMIDServer(mid);
		restMessage.setEccParameter( 'skip_sensor', 'true' );
	}
	var processUrl = apiUrl + "/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/processes?relativeTime=hour&host=" + hostId;
	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + token);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(processUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();
	if(status == 200) {
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());	
		gs.debug("Dynatrace application processes for Host -" + hostId + " : "  + p.length);
		
		try {
		for(x = 0; x < p.length; x++) {
			var item = {};
			var values = {};
			//Pass class for Identification Rule for cmdb_ci_appl
			item['className'] = 'cmdb_ci_appl'; 
			values['class'] = 'cmdb_ci_appl'; 
			
			//Fill discovered process attributes
			
			if (gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.use_customized_names') == 'true') {
				values['name'] = p[x]['displayName'];
			}
			else {
				values['name'] = p[x]['discoveredName'];
			}
			values[gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_field_name')] = p[x]['entityId'];
			//Check Running Process Command and Key Parameters  data is sent in accordance with Identification Rules for the Application Class
			if(p[x]['metadata'] 
			&& p[x]['metadata']['executablePaths'] 
			&& p[x]['metadata']['executablePaths'].length > 0
			&& p[x]['metadata']['commandLineArgs'] 
			&& p[x]['metadata']['commandLineArgs'].length > 0) {
				
				values['running_process_command'] = p[x]['metadata']['executablePaths'][0];
				values['running_process_key_parameters'] = p[x]['metadata']['commandLineArgs'][0];	
				//Check Listening ports data is sent in accordance with Identification Rules for the Application Class
				if(p[x]['listenPorts'] && p[x]['listenPorts'].length > 0) {
					values['tcp_port'] = p[x]['listenPorts'][0];					
				}
				// only push CI to IRE if we have at least running process command and key parameters
				var first = new Date(p[x]['firstSeenTimestamp']);
				var last = new Date(p[x]['lastSeenTimestamp']);
				values['short_description'] = '';
				values['first_discovered'] = first.toISOString().replace('T', ' ');
				values['last_discovered'] = last.toISOString().replace('T', ' ');
				item['values'] = values;

				// push this single process into the IRE
				var pl = {};
				pl['items'] = [];
				pl['relations'] = [];
				pl['items'].push(hostJson);
				pl['items'].push(item);
				pl['relations'].push({"parent": 1, "child": 0, "type": "Runs on::Runs"});
				
				var input = new global.JSON().encode(pl);
				//Pass ith through SNOW's IRE
				var output = sn_cmdb.IdentificationEngine.createOrUpdateCI(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.discovery_source'), input);
				
				//For debugging purposes print payload if IRE does an insert
				if(output.indexOf("INSERT") > -1) {
					//gs.debug("Dynatrace CMDB IRE insert payload: " + JSON.stringify(input));
					//gs.debug("Dynatrace CMDB IRE response payload: " + JSON.stringify(output));
				}
			}	
			else {
				//Capture processes which do not pass through in logs if needed
				gs.debug("Skipped Process with no running commands: " + values['name'] + " : " + p[x]['entityId'] + "on Host:" +  hostId);
			}
		}
	}
	catch(err){
		gs.error("Process Error for process :" + values['name'] + "and Error:" + err + "-" + err.stack);
	}

	} else {
		gs.error("Dynatrace CI import failed to processes from host: " + hostId + "  HTTP status: " + status);
	}
}

function processIdentificationResult(input, output, pItems) {
	resItems = JSON.parse(output)['items'];
	for(it = 0; it < resItems.length; it++) {
		// store the identified sys_id along with the Dynatrace id, so that we can refer to it later when we create the application services
		sysIds[pItems[it]['values']['correlation_id']] = resItems[it]['sysId'];
	}
}


// fetches all hosts, processes and process groups from Dynatrace API and 
// creates or updates SNOW server, web servers and services
// Hosts and their relationships are tagged filtered.
function createUpdateServers(tagFilter, apiUrl, token, mid) {
	var hosts = {};
	var processes = {};
	var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	if(mid) {
		restMessage.setMIDServer(mid);
		restMessage.setEccParameter( 'skip_sensor', 'true' );
	}
	var hostsUrl = apiUrl + "/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/hosts?relativeTime=hour&showMonitoringCandidates=false" + tagFilter;
	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + token);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(hostsUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();
	if(status == 200) {
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());	
		gs.debug("Dynatrace hosts : " + p.length);
		// define batches to process if we have more than 30 hosts 
		var fh = 0;
		var th = p.length;
		if(p.length > 30) {
			fh = (runNr % (1 + parseInt(p.length / 30)))*30;
			if(fh >= p.length) {
				fh = 0;
			}
			th = fh + 30;
			if(th >= p.length) {
				th = p.length;
			}
		}
		gs.debug("Dynatrace processing hosts " + fh + " to " + th);
		for (var i = fh; i < th; i++) { 
			try {
				var key = p[i]['entityId'];
				hosts[key] = p[i];
				var host = {};
				host['className'] = hostTypes[p[i]['osType']];
				// fill discovered host attributes
				var values = {};
				if (gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.use_customized_names') == 'true') {
					values['name'] = dyn.shortHostName(hosts[key]['displayName']);
				}
				else {
					values['name'] = dyn.shortHostName(hosts[key]['discoveredName']);
				}
				values[gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_field_name')] = key;
				values['os'] = dyn.extractOperatingSystem(p[i]['osType'], hosts[key]['osVersion']);
				values['os_version'] = dyn.extractOperatingSystemVersion(p[i]['osType'], hosts[key]['osVersion']);
				values['cpu_type'] = hosts[key]['osArchitecture'];
				values['cpu_core_count'] = hosts[key]['cpuCores'];
				values['operational_status'] = "1";
				values['ip_address'] = dyn.extractIp(hosts[key]);
				values['comments'] = extractTags(hosts[key]['tags']);
				var first = new Date(hosts[key]['firstSeenTimestamp']);
				var last = new Date(hosts[key]['lastSeenTimestamp']);
				values['short_description'] = '';
				values['first_discovered'] = first.toISOString().replace('T', ' ');
				values['last_discovered'] = last.toISOString().replace('T', ' ');
				
				if (hosts[key]['cloudType'])	
				{
					var cloudType = hosts[key]['cloudType'];
					if(cloudType.length > 0) {
						values['virtual'] = "true";
					}
				}
				host['values'] = values;
				
				if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.import_app_servers') == 'true') {
					pullApplicationProcessesForServer(host, key, mid, token);
				}
				
				
				// send the result to the identification and reconciliation Engine
				pl = {};
				pl['items'] = [];
				pl['relations'] = [];				
				pl['items'].push(host);
				
				//itemIndex[key] = pl['items'].length - 1; // remember the itemIndex for that Dynatrace id
				//Add Jairam code 05-20-2019
				itemIndex[key] = 0;
				// Add Host-Host Relationships
				if(hosts[key]['fromRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost']) {
					var arr_length =  hosts[key]['fromRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost'].length;
					for(var h = 0; h < arr_length; h++) {
						//fromRel.push(hosts[key]['fromRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost'][h]);
						extractDependentHostInformation(p,hosts[key]['fromRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost'][h],key,"fromRel");
					}
				}
				if(hosts[key]['toRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost']) {
					//arr_length = hosts[key]['toRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost'].length;
					for(var k = 0; k < hosts[key]['toRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost'].length; k++) {
						//toRel.push(hosts[key]['toRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost'][k]);
						extractDependentHostInformation(p,hosts[key]['toRelationships']['isNetworkClientOfHost'][k],key,"toRel");
					}
				}

				var input = new global.JSON().encode(pl);
				//gs.debug("Input Payload:" + input);
				var output = sn_cmdb.IdentificationEngine.createOrUpdateCI(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.discovery_source'), input);	
			
				// for debugging purposes print payload if IRE does an insert
				if(output.indexOf("INSERT") > -1) {
					//gs.debug("Dynatrace CMDB IRE insert payload: " + JSON.stringify(input));
					//gs.debug("Dynatrace CMDB IRE response payload: " + JSON.stringify(output));
				}
				
				// check for errors and save the sys_ids
				processIdentificationResult(input, output, pl['items']);
			} catch(err) {
				gs.error("Dynatrace exception during import of host: " + p[i]['displayName'] + " Error :" + err.stack);
			}
			// empty payload for next environment
			pl['items'] = [];
			pl['relations'] = [];
			itemIndex = {};
		}
	}	
	else {
		gs.error("Dynatrace CI import failed to pull hosts with HTTP status: " + status);
	}
}

function createUpdateServices(tagFilter, apiUrl, token, mid) {
	// first check if companion script is present
	var instance_version = gs.getProperty('glide.war').slice(6,12).trim();
	//gs.debug("Instance Version:" + instance_version);
	if (instance_version == "madrid" || instance_version == "london") {
		// first check if companion script is present
		var scr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_script_include"); 
		if(!scr.get("name", "appservice")) {
			gs.error("Dynatrace application service import enabled, but global script 'appservice' was not found!");
			return;
		}	
	}
	
	var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	if(mid) {
		restMessage.setMIDServer(mid);
		restMessage.setEccParameter( 'skip_sensor', 'true' );
	}
	// cmdb_ci_service_discovered
	var sericesUrl = apiUrl + "/api/v1/entity/services?relativeTime=hour" + tagFilter;
	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + token);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(sericesUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();
	if(status == 200) {
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());	
		gs.debug("Dynatrace services : " + p.length);
		for (var l = 0; l < p.length; l++) { 
			var key = p[l]['entityId'];
			var appService = {};
			appService[gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_field_name')] = key; 
			appService['discovery_source'] = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.discovery_source'); 
			if (gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.use_customized_names') == 'true') {
				appService['name'] = p[l]['displayName'];
			}
			else {
				appService['name'] = p[l]['discoveredName'];  
			}
			appService['operational_status'] = 1; 
			var first = new Date(p[l]['firstSeenTimestamp']);
			var last = new Date(p[l]['lastSeenTimestamp']);
			appService['first_discovered'] = first; 
			appService['last_discovered'] = last; 
			var serviceRel = [];
			// add endpoint
			// add runsOn relationship
			if(p[l]['fromRelationships']['runsOnProcessGroupInstance']) {
				for(o = 0; o < p[l]['fromRelationships']['runsOnProcessGroupInstance'].length; o++) {
					//dyn.mapEndpoint(dis_ser.getValue('sys_id'), p[l]['fromRelationships']['runsOnProcessGroupInstance'][o]);
					var ci = new GlideRecordSecure('cmdb_ci');
					ci.addQuery('correlation_id', p[l]['fromRelationships']['runsOnProcessGroupInstance'][o]); 
					ci.query();
					if(ci.next()) { 
						// add it
						serviceRel.push({'parent' : '', 'child' : ci.getValue('sys_id')});
					}
				}
			}
			appService['service_relations'] = serviceRel;
			var as,aRes="";
			try {

				if ((instance_version == "madrid") ||(instance_version == "london")) {
					//gs.debug("Inside New York Version");
					as = new global.appservice();
					aRes = as.processJSON_manualService(appService);	

				} else {
					as = new global.CreateOrUpdateITService();
					aRes = as.processJSON(JSON.stringify(appService));
				
				}
				
				// add service to service group
				if(p[l]['managementZones']) {
					for(var m=0; m<p[l]['managementZones'].length; m++) {
						dyn.setServiceGroup(aRes['sys_id'], p[l]['managementZones'][m]['name']);
					}
				}
				
			} catch(err) {
				gs.debug("Dynatrace Services error payload: " + JSON.stringify(appService));
				gs.debug("AppServices Error: "+ appService['name'] + " : "+ err);
			}

		}	
	}
}

var dyn = new dynatrace();
var runNr = parseInt(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.process_index'));
gs.debug("Dynatrace CMDB import script run: " + runNr);
gs.setProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.process_index', runNr + 1, "count");

// read all configured environments and sync the components
var environment = new GlideRecordSecure('x_dynat_ruxit_environments');
environment.query();   
while (environment.next()) {   
	var apiUrl = dyn.urlClean(environment['dynatrace_environment_api_url']);
	var isActive = "" + environment['active'];
	if (isActive == "false") {
		gs.debug("Skipping Dynatrace CI import for environment (not active): " + apiUrl);
		continue;
	}

	gs.debug("Dynatrace CI import for environment: " + apiUrl);
	var apiToken = environment['api_token'].getDecryptedValue();
	var mid = null;
	if(environment['mid']) {
		mid = environment['mid'].name;
		gs.debug("Dynatrace uses a configured MID server: " + mid);
	}
	var tagString = "";
	if(environment['filter_tags']) {
		tagString = environment['filter_tags'];
	}
	var tagUrlParam = '';
	if(!tagString.trim().equals('')) {
		var tags = tagString.split(',');
		for(var i=0; i<tags.length; i++) {
			tagUrlParam += '&tag=' + encodeURI(tags[i].trim());
		} 
	}
	gs.debug("Dynatrace CI import filter tags: " + tagUrlParam);
	// create hosts and application servers
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.import_servers') == 'true') {
		createUpdateServers(tagUrlParam, apiUrl, apiToken, mid);
	}
	// create all relevant application services
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.import_application_services') == 'true') {
		createUpdateServices(tagUrlParam, apiUrl, apiToken, mid);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-10 13:39:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>6a609f52db52cf40190bd92b5e96191c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>435</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Dynatrace CMDB Sync</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_6a609f52db52cf40190bd92b5e96191c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-22 18:09:29</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

Need Dynatrace Support?


Setup instructions

Please check following mandatory settings before contacting Dynatrace support:

1. Plugin 'Configuration Management for Scoped Apps' is active.

2. You defined a discovery_source 'DYNATRACE'

3. For import of application services, the global 'appservice' script is mandatory for Madrid and below versions of ServiceNow

Please follow instructions under CMDB Integration section in the Installation Guide under Supporting Links and Docs in

ServiceNow Store

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json</consumes><consumes_customized>true</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>9d97825b4fb75a00dbec7bb28110c7bd</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Problem</name><operation_script><![CDATA[// Test notifications sent by Dynatrace are guaranteed to contain the URL
// https://www.example.com
function isTestNotification(problem) {
	var url = problem['url'];
	if (!url) {
		return false;
	}
	return url.contains("https://example.com");
}


// Processing problem details
function processProblemDetails(pDetails) {
	var aff_cis = [];
	// create the incident
	srv = new GlideRecord("x_dynat_ruxit_problems"); 
	srv.initialize();
	srv.setValue('number', pDetails['nr'] ); 
	srv.setValue('problem_id', pDetails['pid']);  
	srv.setValue('problem_title', pDetails['title']);  
	srv.setValue('problem_state', pDetails['state']);  
	srv.setValue('problem_url', pDetails['url']);  
	srv.setValue('impact_level', pDetails['impact']);
	srv.setValue('details', pDetails['details'] );
	srv.setValue('tags', '' + pDetails['tags'].toString());  
	i_cis = ""; // impacted CI Dynatrace IDs
	i_ci_names = ""; // impacted CI names with attached Dynatrace types
	
	for(idx = 0; idx < pDetails['impactedEntities'].length; idx++) {
		i_cis += pDetails['impactedEntities'][idx]['entity'];
		i_ci_names += pDetails['impactedEntities'][idx]['type'] + ':' + pDetails['impactedEntities'][idx]['name'];
		if(idx < pDetails['impactedEntities'].length-1) {
			i_cis += ',';
			i_ci_names += ',';
		}

		srv.setValue('config_item', pDetails['impactedEntities'][0]['entity']);
		aff_cis.push(pDetails['impactedEntities'][idx]['entity']);

		
	}
	srv.setValue('impacted_cis', i_cis);
	srv.setValue('impacted_ci_names', i_ci_names);
	srv.setValue('environment', pDetails['environmentName']);
	srv.update();
	
	// now add all affected CIs
	for(var a in aff_cis) {
		// additionally add it to affected CI table
		var cis_aff = new GlideRecord("x_dynat_ruxit_affectedcis"); 
		cis_aff.initialize();
		cis_aff.setValue('problem', '' + pDetails['pid']);			
		cis_aff.setValue('ci_impacted', aff_cis[a]);
		cis_aff.insert();
	}
}

(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var requestBody = request.body; 
	// first check if its a try run
	if(isTestNotification(requestBody.data)) {
		// create a test run incident
		srv = new GlideRecord("x_dynat_ruxit_problems"); 
		srv.initialize();
		srv.setValue('number', 0 ); 
		srv.setValue('problem_id', "" + Math.random());  
		srv.setValue('problem_title', "Test incident");  
		srv.update();
	}
	else if(requestBody.data['impactedEntities']) {
		processProblemDetails(requestBody.data);
	}
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_dynat_ruxit/problem_notification</operation_uri><produces>application/json</produces><produces_customized>true</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-03 08:51:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c55e2dd4fbbd600dbec7bb28110c7da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>236</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Problem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4c55e2dd4fbbd600dbec7bb28110c7da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-17 19:26:41</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Problem Notification">37c462dd4fbbd600dbec7bb28110c7ac</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_6a49cbad4f456a40dbec7bb28110c7d4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Problem to Incident Transformation Map">a4867ed14ffbd600dbec7bb28110c7d3</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	
	var ci_item = source.config_item;
    var sync_field = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_field_name');
	
	var cmdb = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci"); 
	var encode = "discovery_source=DYNATRACE";
	cmdb.addEncodedQuery(encode);
	cmdb.addQuery(sync_field,ci_item);
	cmdb.query();
	if(cmdb.next()) {
		return cmdb.getValue('sys_id');
	} else 
	{return "";}
	// Add your code here
	// return the value to be put into the target field
	
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_dynat_ruxit_problems</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-08-05 09:24:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>6a49cbad4f456a40dbec7bb28110c7d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_6a49cbad4f456a40dbec7bb28110c7d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-13 21:25:28</sys_updated_on><target_field>cmdb_ci</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_5afdf7ebdbbbb704190bd92b5e9619bf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Dynatrace Inactivate Undiscoverable CIs</name><run_as/><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2019-09-16 16:11:07</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>on_demand</run_type><script><![CDATA[function InactivateCIs(tagFilter, apiUrl, token, mid, citype) {
	
	var lastseentimestamp,ciUrl,filter;
	var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	if(mid) {
		restMessage.setMIDServer(mid);
		restMessage.setEccParameter( 'skip_sensor', 'true' );
	}
	
	if (citype == "host") {
		ciUrl = apiUrl + "/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/hosts?relativeTime=hour&showMonitoringCandidates=false" + tagFilter;
	}
	
	if (citype == "process") {
		ciUrl = apiUrl + "/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/processes?relativeTime=hour";
	}

	if (citype == "service") {
		ciUrl =  apiUrl + "/api/v1/entity/services?relativeTime=hour" + tagFilter;
	}
	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + token);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(ciUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();	
	
	if(status == 200) {
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());	
		gs.debug("Dynatrace Inactivate script Hosts : " + p.length);
		
		if (citype == "host") {
			filter = "discovery_source=DYNATRACE^correlation_idLIKEHOST";
		} else if (citype == "process") {
			filter = "discovery_source=DYNATRACE^correlation_idLIKEPROCESS";
		} else if (citype == "service") {
			filter = "discovery_source=DYNATRACE^correlation_idLIKESERVICE";
		}
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
		gr.addEncodedQuery(filter);
		gr.query();
		

		while(gr.next())
		{
			var correlation_id = gr.getValue('correlation_id');
			var ciname = gr.getValue('name');
			
			//gs.debug(correlation_id + "-" + hostname);
			
			var countyes = 0;
			var countno = 0;
			
			for(var x = 0; x < p.length; x++) {
                
				
				var ci_entityId = p[x]['entityId'];
				
				if (correlation_id == ci_entityId){
					countyes = countyes + 1;
					
				} else {
					countno = countno + 1;
				}

			}			
			//gs.debug(hostname + ": countyes: " + countyes + ": countno :" + countno);
			if (countyes == 0){
				//lastseentimestamp = new Date(p[x]['lastSeenTimestamp']);
				lastseentimestamp = new GlideDateTime(gr.getValue('last_discovered'));
				var today = new GlideDateTime();
				var dur = new GlideDuration();
				dur = GlideDateTime.subtract(lastseentimestamp, today);
				var diff = dur.getDayPart();
				var daysAfter = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.retire_ci_days');
				
				if (diff > daysAfter) {
					gr.install_status = 7;
					gr.operational_status = 6;
					gr.update();

					gs.debug("The " + citype + "-" + ciname + " has been Retired");
				}
			}
		}
		
	} else {
		gs.error("Dynatrace Inactivate script failed to pull hosts with HTTP status: " + status);
	}
}

var dyn = new dynatrace();

// read all configured environments and sync the components
var environment = new GlideRecord('x_dynat_ruxit_environments');
environment.query();   
while (environment.next()) {   
	var apiUrl = dyn.urlClean(environment['dynatrace_environment_api_url']);
	var isActive = "" + environment['active'];
	if (isActive == "false") {
		gs.debug("Skipping Dynatrace Inactivate script for environment (not active): " + apiUrl);
		continue;
	}

	//gs.debug("Dynatrace CI import for environment: " + apiUrl);
	var apiToken = environment['api_token'].getDecryptedValue();
	var mid = null;
	if(environment['mid']) {
		mid = environment['mid'].name;
		gs.debug("Dynatrace Inactivate script uses a configured MID server: " + mid);
	}
	var tagString = "";
	if(environment['filter_tags']) {
		tagString = environment['filter_tags'];
	}
	var tagUrlParam = '';
	if(!tagString.trim().equals('')) {
		var tags = tagString.split(',');
		for(var i=0; i<tags.length; i++) {
			tagUrlParam += '&tag=' + encodeURI(tags[i].trim());
		} 
	}
	//gs.debug("Dynatrace Inactivate script filter tags: " + tagUrlParam);
	// create hosts and application servers
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.import_servers') == 'true') {
		InactivateCIs(tagUrlParam, apiUrl, apiToken, mid,'host');
	}
	
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.import_app_servers') == 'true') {
		InactivateCIs(tagUrlParam, apiUrl, apiToken, mid,'process');
	}
	
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.import_application_services') == 'true') {
		InactivateCIs(tagUrlParam, apiUrl, apiToken, mid,'service');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-16 16:12:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>5afdf7ebdbbbb704190bd92b5e9619bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Dynatrace Inactivate Undiscoverable CIs</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_5afdf7ebdbbbb704190bd92b5e9619bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-16 16:12:44</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_embedded_help_content_92d9c227db038b00190bd92b5e96190f
sys_update_xml.payload:
trueSystem update sets

An update set is a group of customizations that can be moved from one instance to another. Update sets enable administrators to group a series of changes into a named set and then move the changes as one unit to other systems. In most cases, update sets help customizations to be developed in a development instance, moved to a test instance, and then applied to a production instance.

To create a new update set, click New.

To make an update set your current update set, right-click the update set name and click Make This My Current Set.

Related information
System update sets
Get started with update sets
]]>2018-08-03 12:31:09normalsys_update_set_list-normalsys_update_set_list11000truesys_embedded_help_contentsystem2017-12-21 12:23:13global/92d9c227db038b00190bd92b5e96190f15sys_update_set_list-normal9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c29f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2sys_embedded_help_content_92d9c227db038b00190bd92b5e96190fsystem2018-08-03 12:31:09j

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_a30cb2154ffbd600dbec7bb28110c7e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Problem to Incident Transformation Map">a4867ed14ffbd600dbec7bb28110c7d3</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	if(source.problem_state == "OPEN") {
		return 1;
	}
	else {
		// do not update the existing problem state if user disabled autoresolve incidents
		if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.autoresolveproblems') == 'true') {
			return 6;
		}
		else {
			return 1;
		}
	}
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_dynat_ruxit_problems</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-03 11:12:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>a30cb2154ffbd600dbec7bb28110c7e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_a30cb2154ffbd600dbec7bb28110c7e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-23 07:43:55</sys_updated_on><target_field>state</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f29ce3acdb692700190bd92b5e9619f3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_dynat_ruxit.dynatrace</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Defines several helper functions that are used within the Dynatrace scoped app</description><name>dynatrace</name><script><![CDATA[var dynatrace = Class.create();

dynatrace.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	/* Add calls relationship of the given application service with another application service.
	*/
	addServiceCallsRelationship: function (serviceSysId, calledServiceDynatraceID) {
		gs.debug("Set called relationship for application service: " + serviceSysId + " to: " + calledServiceDynatraceID);
		var ci = new GlideRecordSecure('cmdb_ci_service_discovered');
		ci.addQuery('correlation_id', calledServiceDynatraceID); 
		ci.query();
		if(ci.next()) { 
			// cmdb_rel_ci
			var ci_rel = new GlideRecordSecure('cmdb_rel_ci');
			ci_rel.addQuery('parent', serviceSysId); 
			ci_rel.addQuery('child', ci.getValue('sys_id')); 
			ci_rel.addQuery('type', '1a9cb166f1571100a92eb60da2bce5c5'); 
			ci_rel.query();
			if(!ci_rel.next()) {
				// parent, child, type
				ci_rel.setValue('parent', serviceSysId); 
				ci_rel.setValue('child', ci.getValue('sys_id')); 
				ci_rel.setValue('type', '1a9cb166f1571100a92eb60da2bce5c5'); 
				ci_rel.update();
			}
		}		
	},
	
	
	/* Adds a given application service to a given service group
	   - creates the service group if it not exists
	   - assigns the service to its service group	
	*/
	setServiceGroup: function (serviceSysId, groupName) {
		// get service group, or create new one
		var ser_groups = new GlideRecordSecure('cmdb_ci_service_group');
		ser_groups.addQuery('name', groupName); 
		ser_groups.query();
		if(!ser_groups.next()) { // if group does not exist > create it
			ser_groups.initialize();
			ser_groups.setValue('name', groupName);
			ser_groups.setValue('discovery_source','DYNATRACE');
			ser_groups.update();
		}
		// add service to service group
		var gr_mem = new GlideRecordSecure('sa_service_group_member');
		gr_mem.addQuery('service_group', ser_groups.getValue('sys_id')); 
		gr_mem.addQuery('service', serviceSysId); 
		gr_mem.query();
		if(!gr_mem.next()) { // if service is not already in group, create group membership entry
			gr_mem.initialize();
			gr_mem.setValue('service_group', ser_groups.getValue('sys_id')); 
			gr_mem.setValue('service', serviceSysId); 
			gr_mem.update();
		}
	},
	
	/* Strips a potental fuly qualified host name from its domain and returns
	   the short host name in lower case letters (which is the default from ServiceNow.
	*/
	shortHostName: function (hostName) {
		if(!hostName.contains('.')) {
			return hostName.toLowerCase();
		}
		return hostName.substring(0, hostName.indexOf(".")).toLowerCase(); // return short host name without domain part
	},
	
	/* Cleans the SaaS live url and returns the full API base url */
	urlClean: function (url) {
		url = url.trim();
		if(!url.startsWith("https://")) {
			url = "https://" + url;
		}
		if(url.endsWith("/")) {
			url = url.substring(0, url.length - 1);
		}
		if(!url.contains('.')) {
			url = url + ".live.dynatrace.com";
		}
		return url;
	},
	
	/** Function that maps the OneAgent provided os type and version to CMDB os types.
	  */
	extractOperatingSystem: function (osType, osString) {
		var hostTypes = {'LINUX' : 'Linux', 'WINDOWS' : 'Windows', 'AIX' : 'AIX'};
		if(osType == 'WINDOWS') {
			var wStr = "Windows ";
			if(osString.indexOf('2000') != -1) {
				wStr += "2000 ";
			}
			else if(osString.indexOf('2003') != -1) {
				wStr += "2003 ";
			}
			else if(osString.indexOf('2008') != -1) {
				wStr += "2008 ";
			}
			else if(osString.indexOf('2012') != -1) {
				wStr += "2012 ";
			}
			else if(osString.indexOf('2016') != -1) {
				wStr += "2016 ";
			}
			else if(osString.indexOf('2019') != -1) {
				wStr += "2019 ";
			}

			if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('advanced') != -1) {
				wStr += "Advanced Server";
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('datacenter') != -1 && osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('server') != -1) {
				wStr += "Datacenter Server";
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('datacenter') != -1) {
				wStr += "Datacenter";
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('standard') != -1) {
				wStr += "Standard";
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('web') != -1) {
				wStr += "Web";
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('enterprise') != -1) {
				wStr += "Enterprise";
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('professional') != -1) {
				wStr += "Professional";
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('server') != -1) {
				wStr += "Server";
			}

			return wStr;
		}
		else if(osType == 'LINUX') {
			if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('ubuntu') != -1) {
				return 'Linux Ubuntu';
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('red hat') != -1) {
				return 'Linux Red Hat';
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('core os') != -1) {
				return 'Linux CoreOS';
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('fedora') != -1) {
				return 'Linux Fedora';
			}
			else if(osString.toLowerCase().indexOf('suse') != -1) {
				return 'Linux SuSe';
			}
		} 
		return hostTypes[osType];
	},
	
	// Mapping of OneAgent provided os string to CMDB os version.
	extractOperatingSystemVersion: function(osType, osString) {
		return osString;
	},
	
	// Choose an IP for a list of ips
	extractIp: function(host) {
		// choose public IP if there is one
		if(host['publicIp']) {
			return host['publicIp'];
		}
		// choose first non IPv6 address if we have multiple
		if(host['ipAddresses']) {
			for (i = 0; i < host['ipAddresses'].length; i++)
			{
				// return first non IPv6
				if(host['ipAddresses'][i].indexOf(":") === -1) {  
					return host['ipAddresses'][i];
				}	
			}
		}
		else {
			return "";
		}
	},
	
	isTechnology: function(process, tech) {
		if(process['softwareTechnologies']) {
			for (l = 0; l < process['softwareTechnologies'].length; l++)
			{
				if(process['softwareTechnologies'][l]['type'] === tech) {  
					return true;
				}	
			}
			return false;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}
		
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wolfgang</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-31 14:51:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>f29ce3acdb692700190bd92b5e9619f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>73</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dynatrace</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f29ce3acdb692700190bd92b5e9619f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-16 16:24:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_f62720f54fdf1200dbec7bb28110c70b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Synchronize services job [OBSOLETE]</name><run_as/><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:10:00</run_period><run_start>2016-05-10 16:24:56</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// ServiceNow script for fetching autodetected and monitored business services directly from Ruxit
// 
if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_cmdb') == 'true') {
	gs.info("Dynatrace: start software services sync");
	var yourRuxitEnvironment = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.environment').trim();
	var yourRuxitAPIKey = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.api_key').trim(); 

	var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	var apiUrl;
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.managed') == 'true') {
		apiUrl = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.apiurl') + "/api/v1/entity/services/";
	}
	else {
		apiUrl = "https://" + yourRuxitEnvironment + ".live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/entity/services/";
	}

	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + yourRuxitAPIKey);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(apiUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();
	gs.info("Dynatrace: service sync REST call: " + status);
	if(status == 200) {
		var index = new GlideRecord("x_dynat_ruxit_entity_index"); 
		index.initialize();
		
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());
		// first mark all as non-operational
		var srv1 = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_service"); 
		srv1.addQuery('discovery_source', 'DYNATRACE');
		srv1.query();
		srv1.setValue('operational_status', 2);
		srv1.updateMultiple();
		
		// now insert or update new infos
		var srv = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_service"); 
		srv.initialize();
		for (var i = 0; i < p.length; i++) { 
			srv.get('correlation_id', p[i].entityId );
			srv.setValue('correlation_id', p[i].entityId );  
			srv.setValue('correlation_display', 'DYNATRACE' );  
			srv.setValue('discovery_source', 'DYNATRACE');
			srv.setValue('name', p[i].displayName + ' (' + p[i].entityId + ')');  
			srv.setValue('operational_status', 1);
			if(p[i].discoveredName) {
				srv.setValue('short_description', p[i].discoveredName);  
			}
			if(p[i].serviceType) {
				srv.setValue('service_type', p[i].serviceType);
			}
			if(p[i].agentTechnologyType) {
				srv.setValue('agent', p[i].agentTechnologyType);
			}
			if(p[i].serviceTechnologyTypes) {
				var aS = "";
				var s = 0;
				for (var a in p[i].serviceTechnologyTypes) {
					aS += p[i].serviceTechnologyTypes[s];
					s++;
					if(s < p[i].serviceTechnologyTypes.length) {
						aS += ", ";
					}
				}
				srv.setValue('short_description', aS);
			}
			if(p[i].webServiceNamespace) {
				srv.setValue('fqdn', p[i].webServiceNamespace);
			}
			srv.update();
			// and store mapping in index table
			if(srv.getValue('sys_id') && srv.getValue('sys_id').toString() !== '') {
				index.get('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('configuration_item', srv.getValue('sys_id'));
				index.update();
			}
			
			// Start to create the application relationships
			var parent;
			var child;
	
			if(index.get('meid', p[i].entityId)) {
				parent = index.getValue('configuration_item');
				if(p[i].fromRelationships.calls) {
					for (var j = 0; j < p[i].fromRelationships.calls.length; j++) {
						if(index.get('meid',p[i].fromRelationships.calls[j])) {
							child = index.getValue('configuration_item');
							var rel = new GlideRecord("cmdb_rel_ci"); 
							rel.addQuery('parent', parent);
							rel.addQuery('child', child);
							rel.addQuery('type.sys_name', "Uses::Used by");
							rel.query();
							if(!rel.next()) { // do not add duplicate relations
								if(parent && child) {
									rel.initialize();
									rel.parent = parent;
									rel.child = child;
									rel.type.setDisplayValue("Uses::Used by");
									rel.insert();
								}
							} 
						}
					}
				}
				if(p[i].fromRelationships.runsOn) {
					for (var j = 0; j < p[i].fromRelationships.runsOn.length; j++) {
						if(index.get('meid',p[i].fromRelationships.runsOn[j])) {
							child = index.getValue('configuration_item');
							var rel = new GlideRecord("cmdb_rel_ci"); 
							rel.addQuery('parent', parent);
							rel.addQuery('child', child);
							rel.addQuery('type.sys_name', "Runs on::Runs");
							rel.query();
							if(!rel.next()) { // do not add duplicate relations
								if(parent && child) {
									rel.initialize();
									rel.parent = parent;
									rel.child = child;
									rel.type.setDisplayValue("Runs on::Runs");
									rel.insert();
								}
							} 
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}	
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-10 16:25:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>f62720f54fdf1200dbec7bb28110c70b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>108</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Synchronize services job [OBSOLETE]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_f62720f54fdf1200dbec7bb28110c70b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-24 21:00:05</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_416cbb2d4f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7cf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Synchronize hosts job [OBSOLETE]</name><run_as/><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:10:00</run_period><run_start>2016-05-10 13:18:03</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// ServiceNow script for fetching autodetected and monitored hosts directly from Dynatrace
// 
if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_cmdb') == 'true') {
	gs.info("Dynatrace: host and process group sync");
	var yourRuxitEnvironment = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.environment').trim();
	var yourRuxitAPIKey = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.api_key').trim();

	var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	var apiUrl;
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.managed') == 'true') {
		apiUrl = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.apiurl') + "/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/hosts/";
	}
	else {
		apiUrl = "https://" + yourRuxitEnvironment + ".live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/hosts/";
	}

	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + yourRuxitAPIKey);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(apiUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();
	gs.info("Dynatrace: finished host rest call: " + status);
	if(status == 200) {
		var index = new GlideRecord("x_dynat_ruxit_entity_index"); 
		index.initialize();
		
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());
		// first mark all as non-operational
		var srv1 = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_server"); 
		srv1.addQuery('discovery_source', 'DYNATRACE');
		srv1.query();
		srv1.setValue('operational_status', 2);
		srv1.updateMultiple();
		
		// now insert or update new infos
		var srv = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_server"); 
		srv.initialize();
		var i = 0;
		for (var host in p) { 
			srv.get('correlation_id', p[i].entityId);
			srv.setValue('correlation_id', p[i].entityId);  
			srv.setValue('correlation_display', 'DYNATRACE' );  
			srv.setValue('discovery_source', 'DYNATRACE' );  
			srv1.setValue('operational_status', 1);
			srv.setValue('name', p[i].displayName);  
			if(p[i].discoveredName) {
				srv.setValue('short_description', p[i].discoveredName);  
			}
			if(p[i].osType) {
				srv.setValue('os', p[i].osType);
			}
			if(p[i].osArchitecture) {
				srv.setValue('cpu_type', p[i].osArchitecture);
			}
			if(p[i].osVersion) {
				srv.setValue('os_version', p[i].osVersion);
			}
			if(p[i].hypervisorType) {
				srv.setValue('hypervisortype', p[i].hypervisorType);
			}
			if(p[i].ipAddresses) {
				var aS = "";
				var s = 0;
				for (var a in p[i].ipAddresses) {
					aS += p[i].ipAddresses[s];
					s++;
					if(s < p[i].ipAddresses.length) {
						aS += ", ";
					}
				}
				srv.setValue('ip_address', aS);
			}
			srv.update();
			
			// and store mapping in index table
			if(srv.getValue('sys_id') && srv.getValue('sys_id').toString() !== '') {
				index.get('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('configuration_item', srv.getValue('sys_id'));
				index.update();
			}
			i++;
		}	
	}

	// synchronize process-groups
	var pgApiUrl;
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.managed') == 'true') {
		pgApiUrl = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.apiurl') + "/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/process-groups/";
	}
	else {
		pgApiUrl = "https://" + yourRuxitEnvironment + ".live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/entity/infrastructure/process-groups/";
	}
	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + yourRuxitAPIKey);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(pgApiUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();
	gs.info("Dynatrace: finished process group rest call: " + status);
	if(status == 200) {
		var index = new GlideRecord("x_dynat_ruxit_entity_index"); 
		index.initialize();
		
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());
		var srv = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_cluster"); 
		srv.initialize();

		var i = 0;
		for (var pg in p) { 
			srv.get('correlation_id', p[i].entityId);
			srv.setValue('correlation_id', p[i].entityId);  
			srv.setValue('correlation_display', 'DYNATRACE' ); 
			srv.setValue('discovery_source', 'DYNATRACE');
			srv.setValue('operational_status', 1);
			srv.setValue('name', p[i].displayName + ' (' + p[i].entityId + ')' );  
			if(p[i].discoveredName) {
				srv.setValue('short_description', p[i].discoveredName);  
			}
			if(p[i].softwareTechnologies) {
				var sTs = [];
				for(tt = 0; tt < p[i].softwareTechnologies.length; tt++) {
					sTs.push(p[i].softwareTechnologies[tt].type);
				}
				srv.setValue('technology_type', sTs);
			}
			srv.update();
			// and store mapping in index table
			if(srv.getValue('sys_id') && srv.getValue('sys_id').toString() !== '') {
				index.get('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('configuration_item', srv.getValue('sys_id'));
				index.update();
			}
			
			// Start to create the application relationships
			var parent;
			var child;
	
			if(index.get('meid', p[i].entityId)) {
				parent = index.getValue('configuration_item');
				if(p[i].fromRelationships.runsOn) {
					for (var j = 0; j < p[i].fromRelationships.runsOn.length; j++) {
						if(index.get('meid', p[i].fromRelationships.runsOn[j])) {
							child = index.getValue('configuration_item');
							var rel = new GlideRecord("cmdb_rel_ci"); 
							rel.addQuery('parent', parent);
							rel.addQuery('child', child);
							rel.addQuery('type.sys_name', "Runs on::Runs");
							rel.query();
							if(!rel.next()) { // do not add duplicate relations
								if(parent && child) {
									rel.initialize();
									rel.parent = parent;
									rel.child = child;
									rel.type.setDisplayValue("Runs on::Runs");
									rel.insert();
								}
							} 
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			i++;
		}
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-10 13:22:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>416cbb2d4f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>114</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Synchronize hosts job [OBSOLETE]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_416cbb2d4f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-24 20:59:55</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_dictionary_x_dynat_ruxit_affectedcis_ci_impacted
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="ci_impacted" table="x_dynat_ruxit_affectedcis"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>reject</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Problem to Incident Transformation Map">a4867ed14ffbd600dbec7bb28110c7d3</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	if(source.problem_state == "OPEN") {
		return "";
	}
	else {
		// do not update the existing problem state if user disabled autoresolve incidents
		if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.autoresolveproblems') == 'true') {
			return "Closed/Resolved by Caller";
		}
		else {
			return "";
		}
	}
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_dynat_ruxit_problems</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wolfgang</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-17 08:32:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>9371da48db9d6b40190bd92b5e961942</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_9371da48db9d6b40190bd92b5e961942</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wolfgang</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-17 11:23:08</sys_updated_on><target_field>close_code</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a9af6c25db737f4088a33ebd7c961942
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_dynat_ruxit.dynatrace_checkconfig</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Check configuration for the Dynatrace Scoped App</description><name>dynatrace_checkconfig</name><script><![CDATA[var dynatrace_checkconfig = Class.create();
dynatrace_checkconfig.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

   
		/** Checks is the actual configuration given by the user contains any issues. 
	  */
	checkConfiguration: function () {
		var results = { "errors" : [] };
		//var buildingid = this.getParameter('sysparm_buildingid');
		// first check if the 'Configuration Management for Scoped Apps' is active (table: v_plugin, id:com.snc.cmdb.scoped, acive: active)
		var pl = new GlideRecord('v_plugin'); 
		pl.addQuery('id','com.snc.cmdb.scoped');
		pl.query(); 
		if (pl.next()) { 
			if(pl.getValue("active") != 'active') {
				results.errors.push("Plugin 'Configuration Management for Scoped Apps' found but not active!");
			}
			// plugin found and active, everything ok
		}
		else {
			results.errors.push("Plugin 'Configuration Management for Scoped Apps' not found!");
		}
		// second check if there exists a discovery source 'DYNATRACE' (sys_choice)
		var ds = new GlideRecord('sys_choice'); 
		ds.addQuery('value',gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.discovery_source'));
		ds.query(); 
		if (ds.next()) { 
			if(ds.getValue("label") != 'DYNATRACE') {
				results.errors.push("Discovery source 'DYNATRACE' has set a wrong label: " + ds.getValue("label"));
			}
			if(ds.getValue("element") != 'discovery_source') {
				results.errors.push("Discovery source 'DYNATRACE' has set a wrong element: " + ds.getValue("element"));
			}
			if(ds.getValue("name") != 'cmdb_ci') {
				results.errors.push("Discovery source 'DYNATRACE' has set a wrong table: " + ds.getValue("name"));
			}
		}
		else {
			results.errors.push("Discovery source " + gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.discovery_source') + " not found!");
		}
		// third check the connectivity for all configured environments
		// read all configured environments and sync the components
		var environment = new GlideRecord('x_dynat_ruxit_environments');
		environment.query();   
		while (environment.next()) {   
			var apiUrl = dynatrace.prototype.urlClean.call(this,environment['dynatrace_environment_api_url']);
			var isActive = "" + environment['active'];
			if (isActive == "false") {
				continue;
			}
			var apiToken = environment['api_token'].getDecryptedValue();
			var mid = null;
			if(environment['mid']) {
				mid = environment['mid'].name;
			}
			
			var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
			if(mid) {
				restMessage.setMIDServer(mid);
				restMessage.setEccParameter( 'skip_sensor', 'true' );
			}
			
			var url = apiUrl + "/api/v1/time";
			
			restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
			restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + apiToken);
			restMessage.setEndpoint(url);
			
			var response = restMessage.execute();
			status = response.getStatusCode();
			if(status != 200) {
				results.errors.push("Connection issue with Dynatrace environment: " + environment['environment_name']);
			}
		}
		
		// return all errors
        return JSON.stringify(results);         
	},

});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jairam</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-09 20:11:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>a9af6c25db737f4088a33ebd7c961942</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dynatrace_checkconfig</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a9af6c25db737f4088a33ebd7c961942</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-16 14:03:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_c0e41dd04f2ff600dbec7bb28110c7c9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Affected CIs Transform Map">9c73dd904f2ff600dbec7bb28110c7ee</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	
	
	var ci_item = source.ci_impacted;
    var sync_field = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_field_name');

	var cmdb = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci"); 
	var encode = "discovery_source=DYNATRACE";
	cmdb.addEncodedQuery(encode);
    cmdb.addQuery(sync_field,ci_item);
	cmdb.query();

	if(cmdb.next()) {
		return(cmdb.getValue('sys_id'));
	} else 
	{return "";}

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_dynat_ruxit_affectedcis</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-20 06:32:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>c0e41dd04f2ff600dbec7bb28110c7c9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_c0e41dd04f2ff600dbec7bb28110c7c9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-13 21:24:17</sys_updated_on><target_field>ci_item</target_field><target_table>task_ci</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_ee8b53fd4f535200dbec7bb28110c706
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Synchronize applications job [OBSOLETE]</name><run_as/><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:10:00</run_period><run_start>2016-05-11 05:33:00</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// ServiceNow script for fetching autodetected and monitored applications directly from Dynatrace
//
if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.sync_cmdb') == 'true') {
	gs.info("Dynatrace: start synchronizing applications");
	var yourRuxitEnvironment = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.environment').trim();
	var yourRuxitAPIKey = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.api_key').trim();  

	var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	var apiUrl;
	if(gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.managed') == 'true') {
		apiUrl = gs.getProperty('x_dynat_ruxit.apiurl') + "/api/v1/entity/applications/";
		gs.info("Dynatrace Managed config: " + apiUrl);
	}
	else {
		apiUrl = "https://" + yourRuxitEnvironment + ".live.dynatrace.com/api/v1/entity/applications/";
		gs.info("Dynatrace SaaS config: " + apiUrl);
	}
	restMessage.setHttpMethod('get');
	restMessage.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Api-Token ' + yourRuxitAPIKey);
	restMessage.setEndpoint(apiUrl);
	var response = restMessage.execute();
	status = response.getStatusCode();
	gs.info("Dynatrace: finished app rest call: " + status);
	if(status == 200) {
		var index = new GlideRecord("x_dynat_ruxit_entity_index"); 
		index.initialize();
		
		var p = new global.JSON().decode(response.getBody());
		// first mark all as non-operational
		var srv1 = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_service"); 
		srv1.addQuery('discovery_source', 'DYNATRACE');
		srv1.query();
		srv1.setValue('operational_status', 2);
		srv1.updateMultiple();
		
		// now insert or update new infos
		var srv = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci_service"); 
		srv.initialize();
		
		for (var i = 0; i < p.length; i++) {  
			srv.get('correlation_id',  p[i].entityId );
			srv.setValue('correlation_id',  p[i].entityId );  
			srv.setValue('correlation_display', 'DYNATRACE' );
			srv.setValue('discovery_source', 'DYNATRACE');
			srv.setValue('operational_status', 1);
			srv.setValue('name', p[i].displayName + ' (' + p[i].entityId + ')');  
			if(p[i].discoveredName) {
				srv.setValue('short_description', p[i].discoveredName);  
			}
			srv.update();
			// and store mapping in index table
			if(srv.getValue('sys_id') && srv.getValue('sys_id').toString() !== '') {
				index.get('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('meid', p[i].entityId);
				index.setValue('configuration_item', srv.getValue('sys_id'));
				index.update();
			}
		}

		// Start to create the application relationships
		var parent;
		var child;
	
		for (var i = 0; i < p.length; i++) { 
			if(index.get('meid', p[i].entityId)) {
				parent = index.getValue('configuration_item');
				if(p[i].fromRelationships.calls) {
					for (var j = 0; j < p[i].fromRelationships.calls.length; j++) {
						if(index.get('meid', p[i].fromRelationships.calls[j])) {
							child = index.getValue('configuration_item');
						}
						var rel = new GlideRecord("cmdb_rel_ci"); 
						rel.addQuery('parent', parent);
						rel.addQuery('child', child);
						rel.addQuery('type.sys_name', "Uses::Used by");
						rel.query();
						if(!rel.next()) { // do not add duplicate relations
							if(parent && child) {
								rel.initialize();
								rel.parent = parent;
								rel.child = child;
								rel.type.setDisplayValue("Uses::Used by");
								rel.insert();
							}
						} 
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	gs.info("Dynatrace: finished application list sync");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-11 05:35:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>ee8b53fd4f535200dbec7bb28110c706</sys_id><sys_mod_count>97</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Synchronize applications job [OBSOLETE]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration" source="x_dynat_ruxit">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Dynatrace CMDB Integration">9f77f7a94f9f1200dbec7bb28110c7c2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_ee8b53fd4f535200dbec7bb28110c706</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jairam</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-24 20:59:45</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>
